fullText:
Whirling Iron Defense

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, monk, iron soul flurry of blows power
Benefit: When you use your iron soul flurry of blows, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses against each target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 139.
name: Whirling Iron Defense
prerequisite: 11th level, monk, iron soul flurry of blows power
benefit: When you use your iron soul flurry of blows, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses against each target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.
